rss.title: PAG L95e Battery 14.8V 6.5Ah Model 9310V
rss.description: Model 9310V A budget broadcast battery with a high-quality construction, comprehensive safety features and superior performance. Rated maximum continuous output is 7A. Features self-recovery after shutdown by simply pressing the display button. No 'service charge' required. The L95e is UN tested and certified. It is rated below 100Wh and is therefore suitable for air transport in hand luggage without quantity restriction. 14.8V 6.5Ah 95Wh, Li-Ion V-Mount compatible 5 LED Capacity Indicator Indicates run-time on-load Provides percentage display of capacity in viewfinder of Sony cameras Charges on PAG or Sony V-Mount chargers 18 month warranty 130 x 86 x 47mm, 749g

item.title: PAG Lok-on 20 14.4V 50Wh Model 9320V
item.description: Model 9320V The Lok-on 20's compact dimensions are ideal where a narrow format battery is required (width 85mm). It is ideal for powering both a camcorder and a camera light up to 100W, simultaneously. The Ni-Cd cells perform well in extreme temperatures. It can be fast-charged using a PAG ACS charger such as the 4-channel AR124PLD (9792), and the 2-channel Quasar (9726 & 9752). The V-Mount model requires Charge Adaptor Model 9617. 14.4V 50Wh, Ni-Cd V-Mount compatible 18 month warranty 128 x 85 x 60mm, 1.2kg

item.title: PAG SuperPack 12V 5Ah Model 9329
item.description: Model 9329 The SuperPack format is low-profile, and protrudes only 44mm from the rear of the camera, which is far less than 'brick' type batteries. The high-current draw capability of these Ni-Cd cells makes the SuperPack ideal for simultaneously powering both a camcorder and a camera light up to 100W. The Ni-Cd cells perform well in extreme temperatures. The SuperPack is compatible with all PAGlok chargers such as the 4-channel Cube (9702), AR124PLD (9792), 2-channel Quasar (9726 & 9752) and the low-cost Freelancer (9613). 12V 5Ah 60Wh, Ni-Cd PAGlok Connector Charges on all-chemistry PAGlok chargers 18 month warranty 208 x 126 x 44mm / 1.80kg

item.description: Model 9310A A budget broadcast battery with high-quality construction, safety features and performance. Compatible with Anton-Bauer mounts and Li-Ion chargers. Rated maximum continuous output is 7A. Features self-recovery after shutdown by simply pressing the display button. No 'service charge' required. No 'sleep mode' required - the display does not cause the battery to self-discharge. Serial number, date of manufacture, number of cycles and temperature can be displayed on the screens of Anton-Bauer Interactive 2000 chargers. The L95e is rated below 100Wh and is therefore suitable for air transport in hand luggage without quantity restriction. 14.8V 6.5Ah 95Wh, Li-Ion Snap-on Compatible 5 LED Capacity Indicator Indicates run-time on-load Charges on all-chemistry PAG chargers (chip-update required) and Anton-Bauer Li-Ion chargers 18 month warranty 130 x 86 x 52mm, 760g

item.title: Pagbelt NMH 12V 10Ah Model 9212
item.description: Model 9212 Pagbelts feature top quality, deep moulded leather casing, and have a long-standing reputation for quality and reliability. Using high-quality materials, Pagbelts are guaranteed to give a long and effective service life even under the most demanding conditions. Pagbelts now contain the latest Ni-MH cells, specially selected for their superior quality and excellent run-time. Ni-MH technology has greatly improved since its introduction to the industry approximately a decade ago. Customers can now expect a longer cycle life, if the battery belt is always charged with the Pagbelts integral overnight charger. The charger is able to accept a Widerange input supply enabling worldwide operation. The battery belts Over Discharge Protection (ODP) feature prevents cell-imbalance, the most common cause of reduced battery cycle life. Pagbelts incorporate two XLR-4 (F) output connectors. 12V 10Ah, Ni-MH Battery Belt Integral Overnight Charger Over Discharge Protection 2 x XLR-4 output connectors 10 year warranty on leather 18 month warranty on cells

item.title: PAG Powerman 12V 7Ah Model 9339
item.description: Model 9339 The PAG Powerman is designed to provide a robust source of power for hand-held location lighting. The case is tough, lightweight, and designed with rounded corners and edges for comfort during use. The Powerman can be worn rather than carried, by virtue of an adjustable shoulder strap (included) and a waist belt that features a curved body pad (available separately). The weight is distributed evenly as the battery is held firmly but comfortably against the users side. The PAG Powerman contains specially selected cells of superior quality which provide excellent voltage hold-up characteristics and, therefore, extended run-time. The battery features an end-of-discharge indicator and is protected from over discharge. PAG 30V AR Series chargers are recommended for charging all Powerman batteries. 12V 7Ah, Ni-Cd Ideal for powering 12V hand-held location lighting (such as the Paglight) 2 x XLR-4 output connectors End of discharge indicator Over Discharge Protection circuit Includes shoulder strap 18 month warranty 166 x 240 x 81mm, 4.25kg

item.title: PAG Cube Charger (4 x V-Mount / Parallel Charger) Model 9702V
item.description: Model 9702V PAG charging technology is the secret to extended battery life. The Cube is the ideal location charger for V-Mount Li-Ion and Ni-MH batteries. It is robust, ultra-compact, quiet and cool-running. It features a retractable handle to maintain its compact dimensions. The backlit LCD screen clearly indicates each stage of the charging process. The charger incorporates a Li-Ion recovery feature. 4-channel simultaneous fast-charger 4 x V-Mount connectors Features PAG Intelligent Parallel Charging software Simultaneously charges the latest PAG, Sony and IDX Li-Ion batteries Sequentially charges the previous generation of PAG Li-Ion batteries, as well as PAG & Sony Ni-MH batteries High-powered 100W output (6A at 16.8V) Fast-charges four fully-discharged L95e batteries in 6.5 hours Can be used as a camera power supply with the addition of PAG CPA Model 9701V 157 x 157 x 157mm, 1.19kg

item.title: PAG AR301 (1 x XLR-4) Model 9763
item.description: Model 9763 This PAG ACS micro-computer-controlled fast-charger provides safe and accurate fast-charging of Ni-Cd batteries of any manufacture. Charge termination is so accurate that it extends the working life of a battery beyond anything that can be achieved using other systems. The Autoranging facility adapts the program to fast-charge batteries within the ranges 12V to 31.2V, 1.7Ah to 10Ah. However, the charger is optimised to charge 24V to 30V battery packs or belts, via the front XLR-4 (M) socket. A 30V 7Ah battery will be fast-charged in less than two hours. 30V AR Series chargers adjust automatically to enable operation worldwide. Single channel fast-charger Optimised for 24V to 30V Ni-Cd batteries Range: 12V to 31.2V, 1.7Ah to 10Ah 1 x XLR-4 Connector Recovery Charge Program 78 x 142 x 240mm, 1.07kg

item.title: Paglight PP90 (500mm) & LED Dimmer Model 9964LD
item.description: Model 9964LD Paglight is the most versatile 12V broadcast/ENG camera light available. The unique plug-in design feature enables you to convert from halogen to HMI to LED by exchanging lamp holder units. One light does it all. Output is soft and even. A spot to flood facility is incorporated. The light is cool-running at all times and easy to handle. A range of interchangeable mounting options is available. This model comprises: Hot-shoe Power Base with PP90 plug (lead length 500mm) for use with light output on PAGlok Connector Includes LED unit with dimming facility, daylight balanced, consumes only 11W, outputs 850 lux at 2m Rotatable Accessory Kit sold separately Includes Stud Adaptor and Shoe Plate 45mm dia. reflector

item.title: Paglight XLR-4 / Pagbelt NMH 12V 10Ah Model 9875N
item.description: Model 9875N Paglight Kits are designed to provide everything required for a lighting source that can be used either on or off camera, supplied in a fitted flight case. The Paglight incorporates a standard halogen lamp holder and a choice of 2 bi-pin halogen lamps. The light is fitted with a professional accessory holder that includes a daylight filter, a diffuser and two parallel barn doors. A handle is included for off-camera use. A stud adaptor and a camera shoe plate are included for mounting the light to the camera. The XLR-4 hot-shoe Power Base enables the Paglight to be powered from the battery belt supplied. The Pagbelt NMH battery belt is a 12V 10Ah power source, ideal for powering lights of up to 100W. It incorporates an integral overnight charger. This model comprises: Paglight (12V) XLR-4 hot-shoe Power Base (lead length 1.5m) Standard Lamp Holder A choice of 2 lamps (20W, 35W, 50W, 75W or 100W) Rotatable Accessory Kit comprising: 1 accessory ring,1 pair of parallel barn doors, 1 dichroic filter and 1 diffuser 12V 10Ah Pagbelt NMH with integral overnight charger and a power lead suitable for country of use Handle. Camera shoe plate 1/4" Whit. Stud adaptor 1/4" Whit.

item.title: Paglight PowerArc Field Kit Model 9825
item.description: Model 9825 Paglight PowerArc Field Kit incorporates the PAG PowerArc HMI unit and two standard halogen units, enabling you to take advantage of the unique plug-in lamp holder system that makes Paglight the industry's most versatile camera light. Converting the Paglight from halogen to Arc takes a matter of seconds. The kit is tailored to your requirements with a choice of hot-shoe Power Base, suitable for the light output on most cameras (PP90, D-Tap or XLR-4), and a choice of two halogen lamps (20W, 35W, 50W, 75W or 100W). The light is fitted with a rotatable accessory holder that includes a daylight filter, a diffuser and two parallel barn doors. A filter that converts the light output to match halogen is included for use with the PowerArc. A stud adaptor and a camera shoe plate are included for mounting the light to the camera. A camera clamp is included for mounting the Paglight to a camera handle, or off-camera. A handle is included for handheld use. The components are housed in a strong, lightweight and compact fitted flight case. This model comprises: Paglight 12V PowerArc Unit and protector (with arc lamp) Two Standard Lamp Holders and choice of 2 lamps: 20W, 35W, 50W, 75W or 100W A Lamp Protector Choice of hot-shoe Power Base (PP90, D-Tap or XLR-4) Rotatable Accessory Kit comprising: accessory holder, 1 pair of parallel barn doors, 1 dichroic filter and 1 diffuser Tapered Barn Doors PowerArc Conversion Filter Handle 1/4" Whit. bush / stud Camera Clamp 1/4" Whit. bush Camera Shoe Plate 1/4" Whit. Stud Adaptor 1/4" Whit. Fitted Flight Case Storage space for additional components

item.title: LED Dimmer Unit Model 9997D
item.description: Model 9997D The PAG LED Dimmer unit is a plug-in option for the 12V ENG Paglight. It has an output of 850 lux at 2m. This impressive intensity of light over distance has been achieved by focusing the output of the emitters using an integrated lens, and suspending this system within the parabolic reflector of the Paglight. The plug-in LED unit incorporates a dimming facility which provides precise control of light intensity. The spot and flood feature of the Paglight reflector can also be used to control intensity; it floods out to 62 degrees from a spot angle of 22.6 degrees. The colour temperature of the output is a perfect blend with daylight, and can be converted to match halogen light by using LED Conversion Filter Model 9998. Power consumption of this ultra-efficient unit is a mere 11W. The PAG L95e battery will provide almost 9 hours of run-time for this unit alone. No other camera-top light matches the performance or versatility of the Paglight system - which is LED, halogen or HMI. Plug-in daylight balanced LED unit Features dimming facility for control of light intensity Outputs 850 lux at 2m Consumes only 11W LEDs provide up to 1000 hours of light Includes Lamp Protector

item.title: Hot-Shoe Power Base PP90 (500mm) Model 9957
item.description: Model 9957 Once fitted to the camera it enables the Paglight to be quickly connected or removed, leaving the Power Base and associated wiring in place. The Paglight is removed by depressing the release catch and sliding the light backwards. A 1/4" Whit. stud or camera shoe plate should be used to fit the Power Base directly to the camera. The Power Base incorporates a swivelling facility with a captive locking mechanism. Always tighten the locking wheel firmly; this will secure the base while maintaining the swivel capability. Features a PP90 connector and a lead length of 500mm, suitable for use with the light output on a PAGlok Connector, when mounted to the rear of the camera. Low-profile, hot-shoe Power Base for 12V ENG Paglight For use with the light output on PAGlok Connector Lead length 500mm

item.title: Mini Paglight / Standard Halogen / PP90 (500mm) Model 9001
item.description: Model 9001 The Mini Paglight is a miniaturised version of the 12V broadcast Paglight. It incorporates many of the Paglight's design concepts: plug-in lamp holder feature, a hot-shoe power base and cool-running construction. The plug-in feature enables you to convert from halogen to HMI by exchanging lamp holder units. Light output is soft and even. A spot to flood facility is incorporated. The light is cool-running at all times and easy to handle. A range of interchangeable mounting options is available. This Mini Paglight option is designed for use with smaller, digital 12V camcorders fitted with the PAGlok Connector. This model comprises: Hot-shoe Power Base with PP90 plug (lead length 500mm) for use with light output on PAGlok Connector Standard halogen lamp holder suitable for powering with 12V to 14.8V Li-Ion, Ni-MH or Ni-Cd batteries Includes Stud Adaptor and Shoe Plate 35mm dia. reflector Rotatable Accessory Kit sold separately 10W, 20W and 35W (G4 size) bi-pin halogen lamps sold separately

item.title: Paglight 250W 24V, XLR-4 (1.5m) Model 9031
item.description: Model 9031 This compact and portable 250W hand-held fill-light incorporates many features of PAG's on-board camera light. Focusing is provided by a lever situated on the side of the lamp body and is continuously variable from spot to flood. A lamp holder unit plugs into the rear of the lamp head and can be easily withdrawn, making lamp replacement safe and quick. The lamp body and reflector housing are constructed to maximise the dissipation of heat as well as to provide strength and impact resistance. The lamp body has a multi-directional mounting and may be adjusted vertically and horizontally. The desired position can be maintained by a locking lever situated on the side of the light base. The 250W Paglight has a detachable hot-shoe power base that incorporates a lead terminated with an XLR-4 connector. This can be used to power the light from a Pagbelt NMH battery belt. The power base incorporates a 1/4" Whit bush which enables the light to be mounted to a tripod or a handle using a Paglight universal mounting option. Hand-held location fill-light Hot-shoe Power Base with XLR-4 connector (lead length 1.5m) for use with XLR-4 output on Pagbelt NMH battery belts Halogen lamp holder for use with 24V 250W lamp Model 9913 Lamp and Rotatable Accessory Kit sold separately Includes Stud Adaptor and Shoe Plate 60mm dia. reflector

item.title: Paglight 250W 24V Kit, with Pagbelt NMH 24V 10Ah Model 9042N
item.description: Model 9042N Paglight 250W Kits are designed to provide everything required for an off-camera hand-held lighting source, supplied in a fitted flight case. The Paglight 250W incorporates a 24V standard halogen lamp holder and 2 x 250W bi-pin halogen lamps. The light is fitted with a rotatable accessory holder that includes a daylight filter, a diffuser and two parallel barn doors. A handle, a stud adaptor and a camera shoe plate are included for mounting the Paglight. The XLR-4 Power Base enables the Paglight to be powered from the battery belt supplied. The Pagbelt NMH battery belt is a 24V 10Ah power source, ideal for powering the 250W light. It incorporates an integral overnight charger and an AC power lead. item.title: PAG X1A Single-Handed Camera Support System Model 2001
item.description: Model 2001 This single-handed camcorder support distributes the weight of the camcorder comfortably between the arm and the shoulder, and provides a stable shooting platform. It is possible to zoom and frame with one hand whilst supporting the camcorder with the other. Tilting and panning shots can be executed smoothly and without camera shake. The PAG X1A is an economical system ideal for use with smaller camcorders. This new version can be converted into an Orbitor with the addition of Conversion Kit Model 2003. Single-Handed Camcorder Support System for smaller camcorders Counterbalances the weight of the camcorder Provides a stable shooting platform Smooth pan and tilt capability

item.title: PAG Orbitor Advanced Camera Support System Model 2002
item.description: Model 2002 A lightweight hand-held camcorder can cause muscle fatigue after hours of shooting. The PAG Orbitor supports the camcorder and distributes the weight comfortably across the body. It provides a stable shooting platform that enables hours of use without fatigue. The camcorder feels weightless and control of its movement is effortless. It is impossible to shoot HD video with the latest generation of DSLR cameras without a means of support. The PAG Orbitor provides stability, supports the weight of the camera and its accessories, and frees your hands to control shots that would otherwise be impossible to achieve. The Orbitor offers freedom of movement which is achieved by a 3 axis mechanism enabling you to pan, tilt and roll, smoothly. The camera is mounted to a sliding, quick-release camera plate, that is interchangeable with the Manfrotto tripod plate. This makes switching from the Orbitor to a Manfrotto tripod quick and easy. The Orbitor features a telescopic suspension rod that supports the weight of the camera assembly from underneath. It slots into a belt-mounted support pad, and absorbs camera shake. The camera is counterbalanced by a weight mounted to the back-plate of the system's shoulder pad assembly. Its position can be adjusted to fit any operator, and features a cushioned shoulder pad to provide the maximum comfort during use. Adjustable straps secure the shoulder assembly to the waist belt and maintain the ideal position during use. Advanced Camcorder Support System A balanced and stable shooting platform Reduces fatigue on long shoots The camera feels weightless and control is effortless It allows a wide range of professional shooting techniques Pan tilt and roll with 3 axis control Shoot at right-angles to your body Quick-release camera plate compatible with Manfrotto tripod Fully adjustable Quick and simple set-up Tough, lightweight construction

item.title: PAG X1A to Orbitor Conversion Kit Model 2003
item.description: Model 2003 The X1A to Orbitor Conversion Kit provides added stability and control to your camcorder support. The telescopic suspension rod supports the weight of the camera from underneath, and slots into a belt-mounted support pad. The rod absorbs camera shake on tracking shots, and enables 'hands-free' resting between shots. The shoulder straps, which connect the shoulder assembly to the waist belt, prevent the assembly moving away from the ideal position during use. The double-handles provide greater control over your camera for a range of professional shooting techniques. Converts the X1A into an Orbitor Includes the double-handle assembly, shoulder straps, waist belt and suspension rod.

item.title: PAGlok Connector for Orbitor & X1A back plate Model 9522/78
item.description: Model 9522/78 The PAGlok Connector can be fitted to the back plate on the Orbitor or X1A shoulder assembly in place of the counterbalance weight. Professional PAGlok batteries can then be used to power a 12V Paglight M and the camcorder via a 12V to 7.2V DC Adaptor if necessary. The PAGlok battery also acts as a counterbalance weight. For Orbitor & X1A back plate Enables use of PAGlok batteries in place of counterbalance weight Dual PP90 power output ports

item.description: Model 9680/01 This DC Adaptor is aimed at videographers who wish to power their 7.2V camcorder from professional PAGlok batteries. item.title: PAG Firestore Bracket for JVC GY-HD100E + 9522/75 Model 9522/75F
item.description: Model 9522/75F This easy-to-fit PAGlok Connector, incorporating a DC Adaptor, enables videographers to power their JVC GY-HD100 camcorder from professional PAGlok batteries. The built-in DC Adaptor converts the output of the battery to power the camcorder, producing longer run-time. The PAGlok Connector incorporates a PP90 output suitable for simultaneously powering a 12V on-board camera light, such as the Mini Paglight. A bracket for mounting the Firestore DR-HD100 disc storage device is included. It allows the cradle provided with the Firestore device to be positioned in the convenient area between the camcorder handle and the battery. This ensures that the camcorder remains perfectly balanced. This compact installation also allows the camera operator to view the Firestore display without taking the lens away from the subject. The PAG bracket is fitted between the existing earpiece mounting points and the PAGlok Power Adaptor. All necessary fittings are included, and the PAGlok Power Adaptor features a power feed specifically for the Firestore device. The built-in DC Adaptor converts the output of the battery to power the camcorder, producing longer run-time. The PAGlok Connector incorporates a PP90 output suitable for simultaneously powering a 12V on-board camera light, such as the Mini Paglight. PAGlok Connector with built-in DC Adaptor 12V to 7.2V Enables use of PAGlok batteries to power camcorder and on-board camera light Incorporates PP90 power output port

item.title: PAG Firestore Bracket for JVC GY-HD100E + 9522/75 Model 9522/75F
item.description: Model 9522/75F This easy-to-fit PAGlok Connector, incorporating a DC Adaptor, enables videographers to power their JVC GY-HD100 camcorder from professional PAGlok batteries. The built-in DC Adaptor converts the output of the battery to power the camcorder, producing longer run-time. The PAGlok Connector incorporates a PP90 output suitable for simultaneously powering a 12V on-board camera light, such as the Mini Paglight. A bracket for mounting the Firestore DR-HD100 disc storage device is included. It allows the cradle provided with the Firestore device to be positioned in the convenient area between the camcorder handle and the battery. This ensures that the camcorder remains perfectly balanced. This compact installation also allows the camera operator to view the Firestore display without taking the lens away from the subject. The PAG bracket is fitted between the existing earpiece mounting points and the PAGlok Power Adaptor. All necessary fittings are included, and the PAGlok Power Adaptor features a power feed specifically for the Firestore device. PAGlok Connector with built-in DC Adaptor 12V to 7.2V Enables use of PAGlok batteries to power camcorder and on-board camera light Incorporates PP90 power output port Includes bracket for mounting Firestore DR-HD100 disc storage device

item.title: PAGlok Power Module (12V to 14.4V output) Model 9661
item.description: Model 9661 The PAGlok Power Module is a compact, lightweight unit designed to supply continuous power from two PAGlok batteries for editing equipment, remote cameras or microwave links. PAGlok batteries of any cell-chemistry, capacity and state-of-charge can be used. Output is via an XLR-4 socket. A third power source, such as a Pagbelt can be connected via the XLR-4 input socket. Two Power Modules can be linked to provide seamless power from up to five power sources using Power Module Connecting lead Model 9664. A carrying strap for the Power Module is provided. Designed for equipment that requires a continuous, uninterrupted supply of battery power Utilises existing Li-Ion, Ni-MH and Ni-Cd battery stocks At no time are any two batteries electrically connected Range: 12V to 14.4V PAGlok batteries Max. voltage: 20V Max. continuous current: 12A Output protected against short circuit and over-current 135 x 115 x 55mm / 410g

item.title: PAGlok Series/Parallel Powerbelt Model 9527
item.description: Model 9527 This belt-mounted series/parallel unit can be used to connect two PAGlok batteries in series; it produces an output voltage equal to the sum of the two batteries' individual voltages (up to 30V), for applications such as powering lighting or microwave links. Connecting the batteries in parallel produces a capacity equal to the sum of the two batteries' individual capacities (up to 14Ah, for extended equipment run-time). This mode provides continuous operation. Output is via an XLR-4 socket. Series/parallel unit that combines battery voltages or capacities Achieve higher voltages for powering 24V or 30V lighting Achieve higher capacities for longer camera run-time Two full-size PAGlok Connectors Utilise existing battery stocks, Li-Ion, Ni-MH and Ni-Cd Adjustable, lightweight belt with quick-release buckle Output via XLR-4 connector

item.description: Tandem 150 The smallest and lightest charger and on-camera power supply, the Tandem 150 Modular Power System operates as a DC power supply once a camera or other device is connected and turned on. This unique system functions by separating the Gold Mount device from the power supply, allowing a user to simultaneously charge a battery and power a camera. When a 75 watt draw is exceeded, the system automatically stops charging and performs soley as a 150 watt power supply. When the camera is turned off or the load is reduced below 75 watts, the Tandem 150 system instantly resumes normal operation, as a simultaneous charger/power supply. Charging options with the CA-TMCL (Vehicle Power Outlet adaptor) or Solar Panel 150 Watts Fully automatic Optimal for high power applications Ideal for remote and on-location shoots Operates from AC Mains 100-240 volts AC, 50-60 HZ AC Input:100-240 VAC, 50/60 Hz. item.description: UNIPAC Video professionals unanimously consider the lightweight and rugged UniPac an essential accessory for every camera package. The UniPac consists of an Anton/Bauer Gold Mount with integral belt loops and a 5 ft. power cable with a standard 4-pin XLR connector. The UniPac allows any Logic Series Battery to power any piece of portable 12-17 volt accessory with a standard 4- pin XLR DC input, including the UL-S. Thus, camera batteries can also be used to power most other portable video equipment including VTRs, monitors, test gear, etc. Additionally, in cold climates or in tight spaces, the UniPac allows the battery to be removed from the rear of the camera and worn on a belt or placed in some other appropriate place.

item.title: SO-30/13 Model 8675-0016
item.description: SO 30/13 Accepts two batteries of the same voltage. In the 13 volt mode, the batteries are in parallel providing extended run-time for any 14 volt portable device such as cameras, VTRs, or lighting. Switch to the 30 volt mode, and the two batteries are placed in series to provide high voltage power for 30 volt lighting applications such as HMI's. (Note: The TrimPac, HyTRON 50 and DIONIC 90 are not recommended for use with HMI lighting) Separate output connectors for 14 volt (standard 4 pin XLR) and 30 volt (2 pin Amphenol). The SO 30/13 is an ideal solution to replace out-dated battery belts used to power film cameras. Features leather belt, quick release military buckle and Lexan? cased control module with voltage indicator, dual voltage switch and 10 amp circuit breaker. 100 watt maximum output in 13 volt mode/250 watt maximum in 30 volt mode. *Note: TrimPac, DIONIC 90 and HyTRON 50 have a 7 Amp max output limit.

item.description: QBH HD The QBH-HD is a required accessory for the video/film dual voltage world. Using 4 of the same type of Logic Series Batteries (the high power HyTRON 140/100 and DIONIC 160/HCX/HC are recommended) the QBH-HD will output both 14.4 and 28"8 Volts simultaneously - bridging the power gap between HD video cameras and film accessories. The 28"volt output can handle HMI lighting as well as most film cameras. QBH-HD is especially valuable in production environments where equipment needs to operate for long periods of time or for extending operating time of equipment at high current loads up to 10 amps. QBH-HD features (3) three 4 pin XLR outputs @ 14.4 volts and (1) single 2-pin Amphenol output @ 28"8 volts. 10 amp externally replaceable fuse. *Gold Mount dimensions do not include battery release latch. item.title: EGRIPZ Model 8075-0075
item.description: EgripZ Literally the most flexible camera grip in the industry, the innovative design of the EgripZ provides a new level of ergonomic control of the camera providing additional stability in a wide variety of shooting positions. Weighing just 12.8 oz (360 grams), the EgripZ mounts easily to any camera's 1/4-20 camera mount and can flex into virtually any position around the camera, adapting to any shooting configuration, without getting in the way of normal camera operation. The EgripZ's fully flexible core, constructed from flexible polymer, can be shaped around the camera and the handle, providing a secure and comfortable grip on the hottest day or in the trickiest of positions. One hand operation is more comfortable with EgripZ as a forearm support - preventing the camera from ?rolling? on the operator's wrist. Low shots are much easier and steadier with two hands to stabilize the camera. High perspectives are more achievable with two handed control. EgripZ also allows for mounting of tripod plate to its bottom. The EgripZ is an ideal accessory to add to your Stasis Flex package, adding more support and stability to your system. item.description: ElipZ 10K Battery The ElipZ 10K battery uses the highest capacity lithium ion cells available, providing extended field runtimes as much as 2 to 5 times that of the consumer OEM batteries supplied with the cameras. On a 10 watt camera load, the ElipZ 10K will run over 7 1/2 hours - virtually a full shooting day! This is the first video battery to use the underside of the camera as a mounting surface, away from operator controls. The lightweight ElipZ battery actually improves the comfort and handling characteristics of the camera by lowering the camera's center of gravity and providing an additional handhold. Constructed of high impact polycarbonate, the ElipZ battery provides a strong and secure structural foundation for the camera that can be adapted to any camera tripod or support and requires no voltage conversion circuitry. The unique ElipZ power connector accepts both the camera adapter plug and the ElightZ/EledZ Power Plug. Its high-efficiency 10 watt halogen light increases photometric performance by blending with available light to produce studio quality footage. Lightweight and compact, the 7.2 volt, ElightZ shares power with the ElipZ 10K battery through its exclusive power-plug connector, so there's no need for a separate battery, pouch pack or cables. The durable high temperature, polycarbonate construction allows the ElightZ to remain on the camera without adding weight or interfering with camera operation. Designed with a unique modular mounting mechanism, the ElightZ will mount quickly and easily to any camera with a shoe or stud mount. Other design features include a two-stage hinged boom to offer a wide range of movement and removable light head bezel for quick bulb changes and two mounting points for a wide variety of gels and spun. Fully extended, the head is over 5 inches high and can be extended forward to eliminate lens shadowing. Best of all, at the end of a shooting day, the light folds away neatly into a compact package. Size: 3.74 x 2.40 x 6"61 in (9.50 x 6"10 x 16.80 cm) Weight: 0.4 lbs (0.2 kg) 7.2 volt On-Camera Light Includes light, 10 watt bulb and gel kit.

item.title: QR-RH Model 8075-0149
item.description: QR-RH FOR RED ONE CAMERA Anton/Bauer has designed the QR-RH Handle strategically outfitted with the Anton/Bauer Gold Mount bracket to provide multiple mounting positions and the ability to mount the hard drive in various locations and positions. It provides the opportunity to attach various accessories to the camera's handle via 1/4-20 and 3/8-16 tapped holes. The QR-RH?s tape hook provides a tape measure attachment for camera focus and the extender allows the matte box on the lens to conveniently remain on the camera throughout setup, therefore saving valuable set up time. The second mount, which is designed to hold a hard drive, also acts as a live battery mount that can rotate at 90, 180 or 360 degrees. The second mount also facilitates ?hot swapping? via a male-to-male PowerTap cable of the main battery on the back of the camera, thus avoiding down time or the dreaded 75 second boot-up time for the camera. Power to the camera is provided via a 6" LEMO connector which is hard-wired to the QR-RED Gold Mount on the rear of the handle. Weight: 2.3 lbs (1.0 kg) MAXX I Warranty Size: Fits RED One Camera

item.title: PAG RMC4X-P Rack-Mountable Charger (PAGlok) Model 9702R
item.description: Model 9702R The PAG RMC4X can be used to simultaneously fast-charge Li-Ion batteries manufactured by PAG, Sony or IDX, via four PAGlok battery mounts that connect to the charger via its four XLR-4 outputs. The charger is designed to be mounted in a half-width racking system, and measures 1U high. However, two units can be mounted side by side in a standard full-width 19-inch rack, by using connecting plates, available from PAG. The RMC4X is ideal for use in outside broadcast vehicles, but it is equally suitable for use in a workshop environment and is available available supplied with PAGlok connectors. The mounts incorporate a cable terminated with an XLR-4 connector. A bespoke mounting-board for the connectors, that enables them to be fitted vertically inside the OB vehicle, can also be supplied. The four-channel RMC4X features PAGs unique Intelligent Parallel Charging software (iPC), which uses current efficiently for fast, fully-automatic charging. The high-power unit has an output of approximately 100W (6A at 16.8V). The RMC4X can also be used to sequentially charge the previous generation of PAG Li-Ion batteries and Ni-MH batteries manufactured by PAG and Sony. All stages of the charging process are indicated on the units backlit LCD screen. 4-channel simultaneous fast-charger Includes 4 x XLR to PAGlok connectors Features PAG Intelligent Parallel Charging software Simultaneously charges the latest PAGlok Li-Ion batteries Sequentially charges the previous generation of PAGlok Li-Ion batteries, PAGlok Ni-MH (not NMH60) and PAGlok Ni-Cd batteries High-powered 100W output (6A at 16.8V) Fast-charges four fully-discharged L95e batteries in 6.5 hours 210 x 201 x 44mm , 1.8kg

item.title: PAG L95eR Battery 14.8V 6.5Ah (Red-One) Model 9310R
item.description: Model 9310R PAG L95eR battery, specifically for use with the Red One camera. The 95 watt-hour V-Mount Li-Ion L95eR battery provides a capacity reading, expressed as a percentage, in the viewfinder of the popular digital cinema camera. The PAG L95eR is a 14.8V 6.5Ah Li-Ion battery that has a maximum continuous output current rated at 7 amps. The high-quality, low-cost L95e is suitable for use with a broad range of professional cameras. The PAG L95eR is an adapted version of the L95e, designed to communicate with the Red One cameras viewfinder data display, enabling the camera operator to monitor battery capacity whilst shooting. The L95eR will provide 1 and a quarter hours of continuous run-time for the Red One camera alone. It is also possible to see an indication of remaining camera run-time on the batterys built-in display, by pressing the button twice. The display incorporates 5 LEDs which indicate first the remaining hours, followed by the minutes. The capacities of two L95eR batteries can be combined, to provide extended run-time and a higher current-draw capability for the Red One, by using a new version of the PAG Power Plate dual battery mount. This new Power Plate includes the contacts that allow the capacity information to be communicated to the Red One viewfinder. The L95eR battery (Model 9310R) is compact: 130 x 86 x 47mm (5.1" x 3.4" x 1.85"), and weighs only 0.75kg (1.65lbs). 14.8V 6.5Ah 95Wh, Li-Ion Red-One compatible 5 LED Capacity Indicator Indicates run-time on-load Provides percentage display of capacity in viewfinder of Red One cameras Charges on V-Mount chargers 18 month warranty 130 x 86 x 47mm, 749g
